overview: Your fantasy is about to come true with this special 2-disc set featuring the biggest and baddest names in the biz. Start if off with dream girls like Ashlynn Brooke, Carmen Luvana, Jenna Haze, Gianna, and Tory Lane. Then clean it up with some steaming sensations that include Lacie Heart, Julia Bone, Eve Angelina, Ava Rose, and Alexis Texas! They're the hottest of their kind, and they know what it takes to leave you satisfied. They're your fantasy all-star team!
title: Fantasy All-Stars 8
